topic: What is an access token and refresh token? How do they work and where should we store them on the client side?
description: This blog explores the concepts of access tokens and refresh tokens in authentication systems, detailing how they function and the importance of securely storing them on the client side.
blogSpecialText: Understanding the fundamentals of access tokens and refresh tokens is crucial for building secure authentication systems.
specialText: Access tokens and refresh tokens are essential components of token-based authentication systems, commonly employed in web applications and APIs.
